title: Sanji's Best Episodes in One Piece, Ranked
author: CBR Staff
description: Article ranking Sanji's best episodes in One Piece, highlighting Episode 298's Diable Jambe debut as one of his most significant moments. Notes that the fight with Jabra is among the best in terms of choreography.

title: Episode 298 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 298 containing episode information, plot summary, character appearances, techniques debuted, and production details.

title: One Piece: How & When Did Sanji Get His Diable Jambe Ability?
author: Fiction Horizon Staff
description: Detailed article explaining the origin and mechanics of Sanji's Diable Jambe technique, including its debut in Episode 298 and Chapter 415.

title: Black Leg Style/Diable Jambe - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page dedicated to Diable Jambe technique, detailing all variations, first appearance, mechanics, and usage throughout the series.

title: Jabra - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character profile for Jabra, including his role in CP9, his devil fruit abilities, his battle with Sanji, and his Doriki rating of 2180.

title: Fiery Kicks! Sanji's Full Course of Foot Techniques! - IMDB
author: IMDB
description: IMDB page for Episode 298 with a rating of 8.6, indicating strong fan reception. Includes production credits and user reviews.

title: Chapter 415 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Manga chapter wiki page for Chapter 415 'Heat Up', which was adapted into Episode 298. Details the Diable Jambe debut in manga format.
